topic.title: Adding a Domain
topic.p: You are the only user who can add domains to your server.

ol.title: To add a Virtual Host Domain:

li.p: In the Domain Management menu group, click Add Domain (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.
The Add Domain: Setup window appears.

ol.li: Next to Domain Admin, from the Add the domain to the following user drop-down list, select the domain administrator.

Next to Domain, type the user's domain name.
Note: After a domain is added, the domain name cannot be changed.
Next to IP Address, select the IP address for the domain.

Next to Web Services, select the web services you want to enable. Enabling CGI permits CGI scripts in the domain's cgi-bin directory. Enabling SSL permits secure HTTPS connection using a shared certificate.
Next to End Users, select the number of end users you want to allow the domain administrator to create.
Next to Email Addresses, select the number of email addresses you want to allow the domain administrator to create.
Next to Website Logs, select the Website log options you want.

ul.li: Select Do not create or store website logs if you do not want the site to use logs.
Select Create and store website logs if you want to use third-party stats packages.
Select Never rotate website logs if you do not want to delete any logs.
Click Rotate and select the frequency of the log rotation you want from the associated drop-down menu.
Select the number of logs you want to save from the and save drop-down menu.

ol.li: Next to Domain Contact, type the email address of the person to be contacted if error messages are generated for the domain.

Next to Mail Catchall, select the option you want.
Select Reject mail - return as unknown user if you want misaddressed mail returned to the user with an “unknown user” reply message.
Select Silently discard mail if you want misaddressed mail deleted without a reply message sent to the sender.
Select Deliver mail to Domain Admin if you want misaddressed mail sent to the email address of the domain administrator.
Select Deliver mail to: if you want misaddressed mail delivered to the email address you type in the associated field. If you type multiple addresses, separate each one with a comma.
Note: If you type multiple addresses, separate each one with a comma.

When you are finished, click Next. The Add Domain Preview window appears displaying the options you have selected for this domain. To make any changes, click Previous, make the desired changes, then click Next to go to the Preview window.

Click Save/Create Another if you want to create another domain. A message appears confirming that the domain has been added and the window refreshes with blank fields. If you do not want to create another domain, click Save. A message appears confirming that the domain has been added.
